projects.title: F1 Pit Strategy Predictor LSTM
projects.description: Deep learning system predicting Formula 1 pit stop strategies using real telemetry data. Achieves AUC 0.93 for pit timing and 78% accuracy for compound selection using Bidirectional LSTM with Multi-Head Attention.

projects.title: Network Hardening Planner
projects.description: AI-based automated planning system for network security hardening. Generates optimal action plans to close insecure ports while minimizing operational impact.

projects.title: OpenID Connect & Digital Identity
projects.description: Bachelor's thesis on authentication and authorization standards including OpenID Connect and OAuth 2.0. Explored practical applications and security implications.

projects.title: TalentScope AI
projects.description: Machine learning classification pipeline using ensemble models with advanced feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning for FIFA 2022 player potential prediction.

projects.title: Oracool Web Platform
projects.description: Full-stack web application for sports predictions with Laravel backend, MySQL database, and responsive Bootstrap frontend following Agile methodology.

projects.title: Data Hiding Research
projects.description: Exploration of steganography techniques using CNNs and GANs for robust and subtle hidden information in multimedia files. Research paper available.

projects.title: Grid Pathfinding Algorithms
projects.description: Implementation of efficient pathfinding algorithms for obstacle-based path computation on grid systems using advanced graph theory techniques.

projects.title: Work Performance Trading
projects.description: Java application for automated resource exchange with modular architecture following SOLID principles and design patterns.

projects.title: Electromagnetic Field Analysis
projects.description: MATLAB project for quantitative analysis of electromagnetic field exposure from HF antennas and eLF power lines with visualization tools.

projects.title: Gurobi Optimization
projects.description: Mathematical optimization using Gurobi solver for complex constraint satisfaction and linear programming problems.
